mapper.sql: JCXH as jcxh,BRID as brid,YJLX as yjlx,SQLX as sqlx,JCH as jch,SQYS as sqys,SQSJ as sqsj,YYRQ as yyrq,SFJJ as sfjj,YYSJ as yysj,JCMD as jcmd,JCFY as jcfy,QTJCJG as qtjcjg,GMFY as gmfy,ZYH as zyh,MZHM as mzhm,JCBW as jcbw,JCXM as jcxm,TZTZ as tztz,JZXH as jzxh,JCDD as jcdd,YJXH as yjxh,YYZT as yyzt,JCZT as jczt,HYID as hyid,JCLX as jclx,ZXKS as zxks,TJHM as tjhm,XMBH as xmbh,ALT as alt,HBSAG as hbsag,SFWT as sfwt,YWTNBS as ywtnbs,KNJSY as knjsy,YCXHJQ as ycxhjq,WJSGJ as wjsgj,SXHDSSS as sxhdsss,SSSJ AS sssj,JCRQ AS jcrq,JCBLH AS jcblh,JCYY AS jcyy,JCZD AS jczd,MCYJRQ AS mcyjrq,JL AS jl,ZQJCXSJ AS zqjcxsj,YFZL AS yfzl,YFZLRQ AS yfzlrq,JLJCXSJ AS jljcxsj,GGRQ AS ggrq,SJRQ AS sjrq,SJYS AS sjys,SDRQ AS sdrq,QSR AS qsr,BGSJ as bgsj
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CIS_JCSQ01 ( JCXH , BRID , YJLX , SQLX , JCH , SQYS , SQSJ , YYRQ , YYSJ , SFJJ , JCMD , JCFY , QTJCJG , GMFY , ZYH , MZHM , JCBW , JCXM , TZTZ , JZXH , JCDD , YJXH , YYZT , JCZT , HYID , JCLX , ZXKS , TJHM , XMBH , ALT , HBSAG , SFWT , YWTNBS , KNJSY , YCXHJQ , WJSGJ , SXHDSSS, SFBLJC, LDH, BLH, SSSJ, JCRQ, JCBLH, JCYY, JCZD, MCYJRQ, JL, ZQJCXSJ, YFZL, YFZLRQ, JLJCXSJ, GGRQ, SJRQ, SJYS, SDRQ, QSR, BGSJ, JZLSH ) VALUES ( #{jcxh} , #{brid} , #{yjlx} , #{sqlx} , #{jch} , #{sqys} , #{sqsj} , #{yyrq} , #{yysj} , #{sfjj} , #{jcmd} , #{jcfy} , #{qtjcjg} , #{gmfy} , #{zyh} , #{mzhm} , #{jcbw} , #{jcxm} , #{tztz} , #{jzxh} , #{jcdd} , #{yjxh} , #{yyzt} , #{jczt} , #{hyid} , #{jclx} , #{zxks} , #{tjhm} , #{xmbh} , #{alt} , #{hbsag} , #{sfwt} , #{ywtnbs} , #{knjsy} , #{ycxhjq} , #{wjsgj} , #{sxhdsss}, #{sfbljc}, #{ldh}, #{blh}, #{sssj}, #{jcrq}, #{jcblh}, #{jcyy}, #{jczd}, #{mcyjrq}, #{jl}, #{zqjcxsj}, #{yfzl}, #{yfzlrq}, #{jljcxsj}, #{ggrq}, #{sjrq}, #{sjys}, #{sdrq}, #{qsr}, #{bgsj}, #{jzlsh} )
mapper.select: SELECT FROM CIS_JCSQ01 WHERE JCXH = #{jcxh}
SELECT count(*) FROM CIS_JCSQ01

SELECT count(*) FROM CIS_JCSQ01 A, DIC_YJLX B, OP_YJCF01 C where A.YJLX = B.ID AND A.JCXH = C.SQID AND B.PID = 26 AND A.SQLX = 1 AND C.ZFPB = 0 AND A.BRID = #{brid} AND date_format(A.SQSJ,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{sqsj}
mapper.update: UPDATE CIS_JCSQ01 SET YYRQ = #{yyrq}, YYSJ = #{yysj}, HYID = #{hyid}, JCLX = #{sbmc}, YYZT = 1, JCZT = 2 WHERE JCXH = #{jcxh}
UPDATE CIS_JCSQ01 SET YYRQ = NULL, YYSJ = '', HYID = '', JCZT = 0, YYZT = '3' WHERE JCXH = #{jcxh}
UPDATE CIS_JCSQ01 SET YYRQ = NULL, YYSJ = null, HYID = null, YYZT=0, JCZT=0 WHERE JCXH = #{jcxh}
update CIS_JCSQ01 set JCZT = 10 Where EXISTS (select SQID from OP_YJCF01 where JGID=#{JGID} and MZXH=#{MZXH} and CIS_JCSQ01.JCXH=OP_YJCF01.SQID)
UPDATE CIS_JCSQ01 SET JCZT = 2 WHERE JCXH =#{JCXH}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CIS_JCSQ01 WHERE JCXH =( SELECT SQID FROM OP_YJCF01 WHERE YJXH = #{yjxh})
mapper.select: SELECT a.JCXH AS JCXH, a.SQSJ AS SQRQ, a.JCBW AS JCBW, a.JCXM AS JCXM, a.JCLX AS JCLX, a.JCFY AS JCFY, DATE_FORMAT(a.YYRQ,'%Y-%m-%d') AS YYRQ, a.YYSJ AS YYSJ, b.BRID AS BRID, b.BRXM AS BRXM, '门诊' AS BQ FROM CIS_JCSQ01 a, MPI_BRDA b WHERE a.BRID = b.BRID AND a.SQLX = #{searchType} AND a.JCZT IN ( 0, 1, 9 ) -- AND a.JCLX IN ( 1, 2, 4, 5, 10, 20 ) AND a.YYZT = 0 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM MPI_CARD c, MPI_BRDA d WHERE c.brid = d.brid AND d.MZHM = a.MZHM AND c.CARDNO = #{searchValue} ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM OP_YJCF01 e WHERE e.SQID = a.JCXH AND e.FPHM IS NOT NULL AND e.ZFPB != 1 )

SELECT a.JCXH AS JCXH, a.SQSJ AS SQRQ, a.JCBW AS JCBW, a.JCXM AS JCXM, a.JCLX AS JCLX, a.JCFY AS JCFY, DATE_FORMAT(a.YYRQ,'%Y-%m-%d') AS YYRQ, a.YYSJ AS YYSJ, b.BRID AS BRID, b.BRXM AS BRXM, ( SELECT s.officename FROM DIC_KSZD s WHERE s.id = c.BRBQ ) AS BQ FROM CIS_JCSQ01 a, MPI_BRDA b, IM_HZRY c WHERE a.BRID = b.BRID AND c.BRID = a.BRID AND a.SQLX = 2 -- AND a.JCLX IN ( 1, 2, 4, 5, 10, 20 ) AND a.JCZT IN ( 0, 1, 9 ) AND a.YYZT = 0 AND a.ZYH = c.ZYH AND c.ZYHM = #{searchValue}

SELECT a.SQDH AS JCXH, a.BRID AS BRID, a.BRXM AS BRXM, a.XMMC AS JCXM, a.JCLX AS JCLX, a.XMDJ AS JCFY, a.XMID AS XMID, a.SQRQ AS SQRQ, a.KDYS AS KDYS, a.XMDJ AS XMDJ, a.XMSL AS FYDW, '体检' AS BQ FROM bstjxt.V_TJ_BALANCE a WHERE a.SQDH = #{searchValue} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM CIS_JCSQ01 WHERE SQLX = 3 AND a.XMID = XMBH AND a.SQDH = TJHM AND JCZT > 1 AND JCZT <> 9 AND YYZT = 1 )

select a.KSDM as KSDM, b.KSMC as KSMC, c.BRXB as BRXB, c.BRXM as BRXM from OP_YS_JZLS a,OP_GHKS b,MPI_BRDA c where a.JZXH =#{JZXH} and c.brid = a.brbh and exists(select 1 from OP_GHMX where SBXH in (select ghxh from OP_YS_JZLS where jzxh=a.JZXH ) and KSDM=b.KSDM)
select a.BRKS as KSDM, b.OFFICENAME as KSMC, a.BRXB as BRXB, a.BRXM as BRXM, a.BRCH as BRCH from IM_HZRY a left join dic_kszd b on a.BRKS = b.ID where a.zyh=#{zyh}
select b.TJBH as TJHM, a.XM as BRXM,a.XB as BRXB from bstjxt.tj_tjdab a,bstjxt.tj_tjdjb b where a.DABH = b.DABH and b.TJBH=#{tjbh}

SELECT DISTINCT a.JCXH AS JCXH, a.JCLX AS JCLX, a.JZXH AS JZXH, a.JCXM AS JCXM, a.BRID AS BRID, a.YJLX AS YJLX, a.SQLX AS SQLX, a.JCH AS JCH, a.SQYS AS SQYS, a.SQSJ AS SQSJ, a.YYRQ AS YYRQ, a.YYSJ AS YYSJ, a.JCMD AS JCMD, a.JCFY AS JCFY, a.QTJCJG AS QTJCJG, a.GMFY AS GMFY, a.ZYH AS ZYH, b.MZHM AS MZHM, a.JCBW AS JCBW, a.TZTZ AS TZTZ, b.BRXM AS BRXM, b.BRXB AS BRXB, b.LXDH AS LXDH, b.LXDZ AS LXDZ, b.CSNY AS CSNY, c.KSDM AS BRKS, d.JZKH AS JZKH, a.ALT AS ALT, a.HBSAG AS HBSAG, a.SFWT AS SFWT, a.YWTNBS AS YWTNBS, a.KNJSY AS KNJSY, a.YCXHJQ AS YCXHJQ, a.WJSGJ AS WJSGJ, a.SXHDSSS AS SXHDSSS FROM CIS_JCSQ01 a LEFT JOIN MPI_BRDA b ON b.BRID = a.BRID LEFT JOIN OP_YS_JZLS c ON c.JZXH = a.JZXH LEFT JOIN OP_GHMX d ON d.SBXH = c.GHXH WHERE a.JCXH = #{jcxh}

SELECT DISTINCT a.JZXH AS JZXH, b.BRXM AS BRXM, DATE_FORMAT(b.CSNY,'%Y') AS YEAR, DATE_FORMAT(b.CSNY,'%m') AS MONTH, DATE_FORMAT(b.CSNY,'%d') AS DAY, CASE WHEN B.BRXB = 1 THEN '男' WHEN b.BRXB = 2 THEN '女' ELSE '未知' END AS BRXB, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,b.CSNY,NOW()) AS RYNL, CASE WHEN c.KSDM IS NULL THEN '' WHEN c.KSDM = '' THEN '' ELSE (SELECT OFFICENAME FROM dic_kszd WHERE ID = c.KSDM) END AS KSMC, b.MZHM AS ZYHM, a.JCXM AS JCXM, CASE WHEN SFJJ = 1 THEN '√' ELSE '' END AS JJYES, CASE WHEN (SFJJ = 0 OR SFJJ IS NULL OR SFJJ = '') THEN '√' ELSE '' END AS JJNO, a.TZTZ AS TZTZ, a.JCMD AS JCMD, CASE WHEN c.KSDM IS NULL THEN '' WHEN c.KSDM = '' THEN '' ELSE (SELECT OFFICENAME FROM dic_kszd WHERE ID = c.KSDM) END AS SQKSMC, CASE WHEN a.SQYS IS NULL THEN '' WHEN a.SQYS = '' THEN '' ELSE ((SELECT PERSONNAME FROM hr_personnel WHERE PERSONID = a.SQYS)) END AS SQYS, DATE_FORMAT(a.SQSJ,'%Y') AS SQYEAR, DATE_FORMAT(a.SQSJ,'%m') AS SQMONTH, DATE_FORMAT(a.SQSJ,'%d') AS SQDAY, DATE_FORMAT(a.SQSJ,'%H') AS SQHOUR, DATE_FORMAT(a.SQSJ,'%i') AS SQMIN, CASE WHEN a.ZXKS IS NULL THEN '' WHEN a.ZXKS = '' THEN '' ELSE (SELECT OFFICENAME FROM dic_kszd WHERE ID = a.ZXKS) END AS ZXKSMC FROM CIS_JCSQ01 a LEFT JOIN MPI_BRDA b ON b.BRID = a.BRID LEFT JOIN OP_YS_JZLS c ON c.JZXH = a.JZXH LEFT JOIN OP_GHMX d ON d.SBXH = c.GHXH WHERE a.JCXH = #{jcxh}

SELECT DISTINCT a.JCXH AS JCXH, a.JCLX AS JCLX, a.JCXM AS JCXM, a.BRID AS BRID, a.YJLX AS YJLX, a.SQLX AS SQLX, a.JCH AS JCH, a.SQYS AS SQYS, a.SQSJ AS SQSJ, a.YYRQ AS YYRQ, a.YYSJ AS YYSJ, a.JCMD AS JCMD, a.JCFY AS JCFY, a.QTJCJG AS QTJCJG, a.GMFY AS GMFY, a.ZYH AS ZYH, a.MZHM AS MZHM, a.JCBW AS JCBW, a.TZTZ AS TZTZ, b.BRXM AS BRXM, b.ZYHM AS ZYHM, b.BRXB AS BRXB, B.BRCH AS BRCH, b.BRKS AS BRKS, b.LXDH AS LXDH, b.LXDZ AS LXDZ, b.CSNY AS CSNY, a.ALT AS ALT, a.HBSAG AS HBSAG, a.SFWT AS SFWT, a.YWTNBS AS YWTNBS, a.KNJSY AS KNJSY, a.YCXHJQ AS YCXHJQ, a.WJSGJ AS WJSGJ, a.SXHDSSS AS SXHDSSS FROM CIS_JCSQ01 a LEFT JOIN IM_HZRY b ON b.ZYH = a.ZYH WHERE a.JCXH = #{jcxh}
mapper.update: update cis_jcsq01 set JCZT = #{jczt} where YJXH = #{yjxh}
mapper.select: SELECT MPI_BRDA.BRXM AS hzxm, DATE_FORMAT(MPI_BRDA.CSNY,'%Y-%m-%d') AS csrq, DATE_FORMAT(MPI_BRDA.CSNY,'%Y') AS csrq_y, DATE_FORMAT(MPI_BRDA.CSNY,'%m') AS csrq_m, DATE_FORMAT(MPI_BRDA.CSNY,'%d') AS csrq_d, MPI_BRDA.BRXB AS xb, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE_FORMAT(MPI_BRDA.CSNY,'%Y-%m-%d'), CURDATE()) AS nl, (SELECT OP_GHKS.KSMC FROM OP_YS_JZLS,OP_GHMX,OP_GHKS WHERE OP_GHMX.SBXH = OP_YS_JZLS.GHXH AND OP_GHMX.KSDM = OP_GHKS.KSDM AND OP_YS_JZLS.JZXH = CIS_JCSQ01.JZXH) AS ksmc, '' as bqmc, '' as brch, (SELECT OP_YS_JZLS.JZLSH FROM OP_YS_JZLS WHERE OP_YS_JZLS.JZXH = CIS_JCSQ01.JZXH) AS mzh, CIS_JCSQ01.ldh AS ldh, -- 联单号 CIS_JCSQ01.blh AS blh, -- 病理号 '' AS txdz, -- 通讯地址 MPI_BRDA.BRDH AS lxdh, CIS_JCSQ01.TZTZ AS bszy, -- 病史摘要 '' AS sssj, -- 手术所见 (SELECT OP_BRZD.ZDMC FROM OP_BRZD WHERE OP_BRZD.JZXH = CIS_JCSQ01.JZXH AND OP_BRZD.ZZBZ = 1) AS lczd, CIS_JCSQ01.JCRQ AS jcrq, CIS_JCSQ01.JCBLH AS jcblh, CIS_JCSQ01.JCYY AS jcyy, CIS_JCSQ01.JCZD AS jczd, CIS_JCSQ01.MCYJRQ AS mcyjrq, CIS_JCSQ01.JL AS jl, CIS_JCSQ01.ZQJCXSJ AS zqjcxsj, CIS_JCSQ01.YFZL AS yfzl, CIS_JCSQ01.YFZL AS yfzl, CIS_JCSQ01.YFZLRQ AS nfmrq, CIS_JCSQ01.JLJCXSJ AS jljcxsj, DATE_FORMAT(CIS_JCSQ01.GGRQ,'%Y') AS ggrq_y, DATE_FORMAT(CIS_JCSQ01.GGRQ,'%m') AS ggrq_m, DATE_FORMAT(CIS_JCSQ01.GGRQ,'%d') AS ggrq_d, DATE_FORMAT(CIS_JCSQ01.SJRQ,'%Y') AS sjrq_y, DATE_FORMAT(CIS_JCSQ01.SJRQ,'%m') AS sjrq_m, DATE_FORMAT(CIS_JCSQ01.SJRQ,'%d') AS sjrq_d, CIS_JCSQ01.SJYS AS sjys, DATE_FORMAT(CIS_JCSQ01.SDRQ,'%Y') AS sdrq_y, DATE_FORMAT(CIS_JCSQ01.SDRQ,'%m') AS sdrq_m, DATE_FORMAT(CIS_JCSQ01.SDRQ,'%d') AS sdrq_d, DATE_FORMAT(CIS_JCSQ01.SDRQ,'%H') AS sdrq_h, DATE_FORMAT(CIS_JCSQ01.SDRQ,'%i') AS sdrq_mm, CIS_JCSQ01.QSR AS qsr, mpi_brda.XZZ_SQS AS shengbm, mpi_brda.XZZ_S AS shibm, mpi_brda.XZZ_X AS xianbm, mpi_brda.XZZ_QTDZ AS xxdz FROM CIS_JCSQ01 LEFT JOIN MPI_BRDA ON CIS_JCSQ01.BRID = MPI_BRDA.BRID WHERE CIS_JCSQ01.JCXH = #{jcxh} and CIS_JCSQ01.SQLX = 1 UNION ALL select b.BRXM as hzxm, DATE_FORMAT(b.CSNY,'%Y-%m-%d') as csrq, DATE_FORMAT(b.CSNY,'%Y') as csrq_y, DATE_FORMAT(b.CSNY,'%m') as csrq_m, DATE_FORMAT(b.CSNY,'%d') as csrq_d, b.BRXB as xb, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE_FORMAT(b.CSNY,'%Y-%m-%d'), CURDATE()) as nl, (SELECT OFFICENAME FROM DIC_KSZD WHERE ID = B.BRKS) as ksmc, (SELECT OFFICENAME FROM DIC_KSZD WHERE ID = B.BRBQ) as bqmc, b.BRCH as brch, b.ZYHM as mzh, a.ldh AS ldh, a.BLH AS blh, b.LXDZ AS txdz, b.LXDH AS lxdh, a.TZTZ AS bszy, ifnull(a.SSSJ,'') AS sssj, b.MQZD AS lczd, a.JCRQ AS jcrq, a.JCBLH AS jcblh, a.JCYY AS jcyy, a.JCZD AS jczd, a.MCYJRQ AS mcyjrq, a.JL AS jl, a.ZQJCXSJ AS zqjcxsj, a.YFZL AS yfzl, a.YFZL AS yfzl, a.YFZLRQ AS nfmrq, a.JLJCXSJ AS jljcxsj, DATE_FORMAT(a.GGRQ,'%Y') AS ggrq_y, DATE_FORMAT(a.GGRQ,'%m') AS ggrq_m, DATE_FORMAT(a.GGRQ,'%d') AS ggrq_d, DATE_FORMAT(a.SJRQ,'%Y') AS sjrq_y, DATE_FORMAT(a.SJRQ,'%m') AS sjrq_m, DATE_FORMAT(a.SJRQ,'%d') AS sjrq_d, a.SJYS AS sjys, DATE_FORMAT(a.SDRQ,'%Y') AS sdrq_y, DATE_FORMAT(a.SDRQ,'%m') AS sdrq_m, DATE_FORMAT(a.SDRQ,'%d') AS sdrq_d, DATE_FORMAT(a.SDRQ,'%H') AS sdrq_h, DATE_FORMAT(a.SDRQ,'%i') AS sdrq_mm, a.QSR AS qsr, '' AS shengbm, '' AS shibm, '' AS xianbm, '' AS xxdz FROM CIS_JCSQ01 a, IM_HZRY b WHERE a.ZYH = b.ZYH and a.JCXH = #{jcxh} and a.SQLX = 2

SELECT DISTINCT b.BRXM AS hzxm, DATE_FORMAT(b.CSNY,'%Y-%m-%d') AS csrq, DATE_FORMAT(b.CSNY,'%Y') AS csrq_y, DATE_FORMAT(b.CSNY,'%m') AS csrq_m, DATE_FORMAT(b.CSNY,'%d') AS csrq_d, CASE WHEN B.BRXB = 1 THEN '男' WHEN b.BRXB = 2 THEN '女' ELSE '未知' END AS xb, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,b.CSNY,NOW()) AS nl, CASE WHEN c.KSDM IS NULL THEN '' WHEN c.KSDM = '' THEN '' ELSE (SELECT OFFICENAME FROM dic_kszd WHERE ID = c.KSDM) END AS ksmc, b.MZHM AS mzh, a.JCXM AS jcxm, CASE WHEN SFJJ = 1 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS sfjj, (SELECT DISTINCT OP_BRZD.ZDMC FROM OP_BRZD WHERE OP_BRZD.JZXH = a.JZXH AND OP_BRZD.ZZBZ = 1) AS cbzd, a.TZTZ AS bqjj, a.JCMD AS jczymd, CASE WHEN c.KSDM IS NULL THEN '' WHEN c.KSDM = '' THEN '' ELSE (SELECT OFFICENAME FROM dic_kszd WHERE ID = c.KSDM) END AS sqks, CASE WHEN a.SQYS IS NULL THEN '' WHEN a.SQYS = '' THEN '' ELSE ((SELECT PERSONNAME FROM hr_personnel WHERE PERSONID = a.SQYS)) END AS sqys, DATE_FORMAT(a.SQSJ,'%Y') AS sqrq_y, DATE_FORMAT(a.SQSJ,'%m') AS sqrq_m, DATE_FORMAT(a.SQSJ,'%d') AS sqrq_d, DATE_FORMAT(a.SQSJ,'%H') AS sqrq_h, DATE_FORMAT(a.SQSJ,'%i') AS sqrq_mm, CASE WHEN a.ZXKS IS NULL THEN '' WHEN a.ZXKS = '' THEN '' ELSE (SELECT OFFICENAME FROM dic_kszd WHERE ID = a.ZXKS) END AS zxks FROM CIS_JCSQ01 a LEFT JOIN MPI_BRDA b ON b.BRID = a.BRID LEFT JOIN OP_YS_JZLS c ON c.JZXH = a.JZXH LEFT JOIN OP_GHMX d ON d.SBXH = c.GHXH WHERE a.JCXH = #{jcxh}
